Thank you it works beautifully. Game is so-so. Kinda fun but the enemies are psychic and can sniper with an assault rifle from a mile away...

Anyways, in case anyone doesn't know how to install, do this:

You will see a bunch of files with extensions like:
.r00
.r01
.r02 etc..

make sure you have 7zip installed or any program that can process .rar files

double click the file with the .rar extension, and tell it to extract. it will extract an .iso file.

mount that file using magiciso or poweriso or whatever program u use, and then just install.

aaaaaaaahhh! no video now! perhaps i need a video card? but fixed directx folks, just go into game directory; C:\Program Files (x86)\City Interactive\Sniper Ghost Warrior\DirectX and run DXSETUP (if it didnt already work at end of game installation.)
